name: Rooms (TheeAlan)
description:
Escape within the time limit!

Hold [Spacebar] to move forward.

A class assignment on introduction to Unity, C#, and game design.

Game  assets are self-made.

Basic features of the gameplay, however, the gist of the game element is included.

The initial idea was a turn-based game. Changed to timer countdown because of issues encountered with C#.

Features like multiplayer, Ai monster, chest with random items, more engaging maps, and lastly turn-based elements were omitted as the complexity is beyond my capability. 

(Revised) - The game was supposed to be hard and have players lost in the maze struggling (the fun part). However this is a prototype, it has been made easy. prevent players from getting lost in the maze in an endless loop. 

Either you game over by time out or ran into the monster in a certain room or....
